data.message: Yes but if the coco cola lorrie  is not coming to a town near you and the nearest place is Leicester coco cola my  kids was looking forward to it but had to tell them it not coming now to Northampton

replies.message: Hi Keith, we try to cover as much of the country as we can but unfortunately we can't visit every single town and city. To ensure that as many people as possible get the opportunity to experience the tour we update the route every year to add new locations.
